M1.title: Weak Random Number Generation
M1.description: Uses MathSrand((int)TimeLocal()) for seeding random number generator
M1.impact: Trading algorithm randomization could be predictable

L1.title: File Operation Error Handling
L1.description: Some file operations have basic error handling but could be more robust
L1.impact: Trading system might fail to load models properly under edge conditions
L1.remediation: Enhanced file operation error handling and validation

L2.title: Array Operation Bounds
L2.description: Extensive array operations with ArrayResize calls
L2.impact: System instability under memory pressure conditions
L2.remediation: Add memory allocation failure handling and bounds checking

I1.title: Hardcoded Magic Numbers
I1.description: Magic numbers 0xC0DE0203 and 0xC0DE0202 hardcoded for file format validation
I1.impact: None - legitimate use for file format identification

I2.title: Trading Account Access
I2.description: System has access to account balance, equity, and trading functions
I2.impact: None - legitimate functionality for trading EA

I3.title: Input Parameter Validation
I3.description: Extensive input validation and parameter bounds checking
I3.impact: Positive security feature - prevents invalid configurations

security_strengths: Comprehensive input validation on all parameters
Multiple emergency stop systems and circuit breakers
File format validation with magic numbers
recommendations: Consider cryptographically secure random number generation
Add memory allocation failure recovery mechanisms
Maintain current excellent risk management practices
Regular security reviews after major updates
